item.title: View Your Pre-Approved & Pre-Qualified Credit Card Offers (Updated For 2025)
item.content:encoded:
该文章汇总了美国主要信用卡发行商的pre-qualified（预合格）查询方式，包括American Express、Bank of America、Chase、Citibank等机构的查询链接和操作步骤。文章提醒，预合格不等于最终获批，银行会进行hard pull（硬查询）。同时提供了直达链接和从官网进入的指引，方便用户查看自己可能符合资格的信用卡产品。

Update 11/18/25: Chase working again

Update 5/6/25: Chase is back (update: not working again)

Most credit card issuers now allow you to view cards that you’ve been pre-approved for online. Here is a full list of issuers that do allow this, along with the relevant websites/contact information.

Being pre-qualified or pre-approved doesn’t necessarily mean you’ll be approved.

Just because you’ve been pre-approved/pre-qualified, doesn’t necessarily mean you’ll be approved, credit card issuers will do a hard pull on your credit report before they approve you and if your circumstances have changed you might be denied for a card they’ve pre-qualified you for. Click here to find out what these terms actually mean.

For those just wanting the links, here is the short list. Keep reading on for more information on all of the pre-qualifaction finders.

  • American Express (personal)
  • American Express (business)
  • Bank of America
  • Barclaycard (only works for Wyndham)
  • Chase
  • Capital One or this link (might provided more offers)
  • CardMatch
  • Chase Pre Qualified Offers
  • Citibank
  • Discover
  • US Bank
  • Wells Fargo

American Express

You can find out if you have “any special offers waiting for you” by going to https://www.americanexpress.com/ then clicking card offers and entering your full name, address and the last four digits of your social security number. You can view this page by:

  • Click “cards” in the top bar
  • Click “view all Personal and Charge cards”
  • Click “Check For Pre-Qualified Offers”

If you don’t see this promotion then it’s likely than you’re signed into your account. I’d recommend either signing out or using an incognito mode window.

It’s also possible to check for small business cards. You can use this link or follow these directions:

  • Click “cards” in the top bar
  • Click “View All Small Business Cards”
  • Scroll to bottom of the page and then enter your information where it says: “See if you qualify for a special offer”

Bank of America

You can view what offers you are pre qualified for with Bank of America by clicking here. You’ll need to enter your full name, address, birth-date and the last four digits of your social security number. You’ll also need to let them know what type of credit cards you’re interested in and if you’re already one of their online banking customers.

You can view this page from the homepage of the Bank of America website by:

  • Click “Bank” in the header, then click “Credit Cards”
  • Click “Prequalified credit card offers” in left sidebar at the bottom

Barclaycard

Unfortunately Barclaycard have currently pulled their pre-approved checker.

To view your Barclaycard pre-qualified offers click here. You’ll have to provide your basic information (address, full name, social security number, how you rate your credit, what type of benefits you value most). If you see a screen that says “Congratulations” then you are pre-approved for those offers, if you see a screen that says “Recommended” then you have no current pre-approved offers from them.

Capital One

To view what offers you are pre-qualified for click here. You’ll need to provide your full name, zip code and the last four digits of your social security number. You also need to tell them your favorite credit card benefit and how you rate your credit level. To view this page from the Capital One homepage do the following:

  • Click “Credit Cards”
  • Click “See If You’re Pre-Qualified”

CardMatch by CreditCards.com

The CardMatch tool was developed by CreditCards.com in an effort to reduce the amount of websites you need to check for pre-qualified offers. They also sometimes run specials where the sign up bonuses are greater through their tool than elsewhere. You need to enter your full name and address, along with the last four digits of your social security number. Click here to check your offers with CardMatch. You can get to the CardMatch tool for the homepage of CreditCards.com by doing the following:

  • Click the card match tool on the front page

 

Chase Pre-Qualified Offers

You can also check to see if you have any pre-qualified offers from chase by clicking here. You’ll need to provide your full name, address, zip code, city, state and last four digits of your social security number.

You can also access this page from the chase homepage. To do so follow these directions:

  • Click “Product And Services” in the header
  • Click “Credit Cards” in the drop down menu
  • Click “All Credit Cards” in the side menu
  • Click “Check for Pre-Qualified Offers”

the credit card section of the chase website, this is the third link in the left sidebar (screenshot below).

Citibank

You can view all your pre-approved offers from citibank by clicking here. As always, you’ll need to enter your full name, address and last four digits of your social security number. You’ll also need to choose which credit card benefit is most important to you. To view this page from the citibank homepage follow these directions:

  • Click “Credit Cards” in the header
  • Click “See If You’re Pre-Qualified For An Offer”

Credit One

Credit One is a sub prime lender and as such most of their cards have high fees and interest rates. We’d suggest you look into a secured card instead of going with them, but they also have a pre-qualified card finder you can use by clicking here. You can reach this page from the homepage with the following directions:

  • Click “get pre-qualified” which is found in the right sidebar, second box down.

Discover

Finding out the offers you’ve been pre-approved for with Discover is simple, just click here and fill out: first name, last name, last four digits of your SSN and answer two simple questions.

You can also get to the above page by navigating to it from the discover homepage, to do so:

  • Click credit card home, which is the first link on the far left of the footer links (at the very bottom of the page)
  • Scroll to the middle of the page and click “See your personalized offer”
  • Fill out the information and view your personalized offers

USAA

Little bit different to the other card issuers here, as you need to be an existing member to qualify. If you are do the following:

  • Log into your account
  • Search for ‘offers’
  • Select ‘My Offers Page’
  • They’ll show pre selected offers here

You can find out more about USAA here.

US Bank

Update: This has been removed for now.

US Bank recently re-added their pre-qualification checker, which you can view by clicking here. You’ll need to enter your full name, address and last four digits of your SSN. You’ll also need to tell them what you look for most in a credit card. You can find this page from the homepage with the following directions:

  • Click “Credit Cards & Prepaid Cards” which is the third link to the left in the header.
  • Click “Credit Cards” which is first link in the pop down menu
  • Click “Check for Recommended Offers” in the main body of the website

Wells Fargo

Wells Fargo has added a tool to check for pre-select offers, you can log in using your Wells Fargo account or just use your details. Click here to see if eligible.

HSBC 

HSBC has recently readded the pre-qualified checker. Click here to see if you’re pre-qualified

Smaller Card Issuers

Here are the direct links for a number of smaller card issuers/store credit cards.

  • BB&T
  • Deserve.
  • FNBO
  • Goldman Sachs (Apple & GM Cards). They don’t have a pre-approved checker, but they will show you your credit line before doing a hard credit pull.
  • Milestone gold (this is another woeful credit card, which we wouldn’t recommend)

 

We hope you found this post helpful, if you did why not let our readers know which credit cards you were pre-qualified for? And also let us know if you know of any other places people can check for pre-approved offers.

If anyone has any data points on whether this works for personal Verizon Wireless bills or for Fios, etc, please let us know.

item.title: Mastercard: Transit Benefit, $2.50 Off $10+ In Select Cities Each Month
item.content:encoded:
Mastercard交通福利原定2025年底结束，现已延长至2027年12月31日。2025年10月9日新增纽约/新泽西(PATH和NJ Transit)及华盛顿特区(WMATA)选项。该福利从2024年10月1日开始，用户在参与计划的交通地点每月消费10美元或以上，可获得2.50美元账单信贷。覆盖城市包括芝加哥、波士顿、迈阿密、费城和达拉斯。对居住在这些城市的人来说是长期有用的优惠，将持续超过一年。

Update 11/18/25: Was due to end at end of 2025. Now ends December 31, 2027. 

Update 10/9/25: Two new options have been added:

  • New York/New Jersey: Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) and New Jersey Transit Corporation (NJ Transit)
  • Washington DC: Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA)

Hat tip to reader Harold

The Offer

Direct link to offer

  • Mastercard has a new transit benefit that runs from October 1, 2024, to December 31, 2025. Get $2.50 statement credit when you spend $10 or more each month at participating transit locations in:
    • Chicago, IL
    • Boston, MA
    • Miami, FL
    • Philadelphia, PA
    • Dallas, TX

Our Verdict

Full terms here. Useful offer if you live in one of those cities. Keep in mind this runs through the end of 2025, not 2024 as well so more than a year of use.

Hat tip to Ben C

item.title: [Confirmed] Hilton To Launch New Highest Loyalty Tier ‘Diamond Reserve’
item.content:encoded:
希尔顿推出新"Diamond Reserve"忠诚度等级，需年消费$18,000和80晚住宿，每消费$1获22积分。现有等级要求将降30%：Silver需7晚/3次/17,500分(原10晚/4次/25,000分)；Gold需28晚/14次/52,500分(原40晚/20次/75,000分)；Diamond需42晚/21次/84,000分(原60晚/30次/120,000分)。新增120晚里程碑奖励，可选30,000积分或确认性升级。

Update 11/18/25: This has now been officially announced. 

US Credit Card Guide was able to find a leak of a new Hilton loyalty tier called ‘Diamond Reserve’ this will be a step above Diamond. Here is what we know so far:

  • Requires $18,000 in spend and 80 nights stayed
  • Earns 22x points per $1 spent (10 base and 12 from Diamond Reserve). Diamond currently earns 10 base and 10 from Diamond
  • Existing tiers will have requirements reduced by 30%
    • Hilton Honors Silver status will require seven nights, three stays, or 17,500 points (compared to 10 nights, four stays, or 25,000 points)
    • Hilton Honors Gold status will require 28 nights, 14 stays, or 52,500 points (compared to 40 nights, 20 stays, or 75,000 points)
    • Hilton Honors Diamond status will require 42 nights, 21 stays, or 84,000 points (compared to 60 nights, 30 stays, or 120,000 points)
  • New milestone rewards at 120 nights, choose between 30,000 points and confirmable room upgrade

Our Verdict

Major change for most readers would be the reduced requirements I think. Will be interesting to see what other benefits are offered from Hilton.

item.title: My Approval on Chase Sapphire Reserve for Business Card
item.content:encoded:
新Chase Sapphire Reserve for Business卡持有者分享申请体验。该卡有$30,000消费要求，$795年费，提供$300旅行抵用金。作者曾于2025年5月申请INK Unlimited卡，现在(11月)符合6个月间隔建议。大额税款支付可帮助满足消费要求，且卡提供6个月完成消费的期限。申请最初挂起，但两天后自动批准。现在需消费$30,000满足要求。

I’m a proud new Chase Sapphire Reserve for Business cardholder!

The 200,000 points signup bonus is excellent, albeit with a hefty $30,000 spend requirement. For me the $300 Travel Credit is good as cash, and hopefully that can be done twice during the first cardmember year which mostly offsets the $795 annual fee. 

I’ve been trying to avoid hitting 5/24 and so have been focusing on business card applications. The standard advise going around is to apply for Chase business cards once every 6 months. My prior Chase business card was an INK Unlimited in early May 2025, and it’s now mid-November 2025, so that should be enough.

I also had a good feeling about applying now since it was crunch time for Chase INK applications with the 90k offer ending. I hoped that with the influx of applications, approvals might somehow come easier. Who knows.

I decided to go for the Sapphire Reserve for Business card due to a few large tax bills (federal, state, property) which can cover a good chunk of the $30,000 spend requirement. The card gives 6 months for meeting the spend requirement which makes it easier to manage. 

I used a referral link to apply for the card, and the card application went pending. Just two days later it was approved automatically without having to call in. Yay!

Now off to spend $30,000…

item.title: Wings Credit Union $300 Checking Bonus + $100 Referral
item.content:encoded:
Wings Credit Union推出最高$300新开户奖励，活动延长至12/31/25。需开设新 checking account，使用 promo code WINGS25，注册数字银行和电子对账单，设立$3,000+直接存款，完成15笔$25+借记/信用卡购买。需同时开设$5储蓄账户。新成员专享，12个月内无会员资格。另提供$100/$100推荐奖励(近期从$50/$50上调)。全国范围内可用，无月费及提前终止费。

Update 11/18/25: Referral bonus is up to $100/$100 now (previously $50/$50). Hat tip to Shawn

Update 11/8/25: Deal is back until 12/31/25. Hat tip to Royse

Offer at a glance

  • Maximum bonus amount: $300
  • Availability: Nationwide with $5 donation
  • Direct deposit required: Yes, $3,000+
  • Additional requirements: See below
  • Hard/soft pull: Soft pull
  • ChexSystems: Yes
  • Credit card funding: Can fund up to $1,500 per account
  • Monthly fees: None
  • Early account termination fee: None
  • Household limit: None
  • Expiration date: August 31, 2025

The Offer

Direct link to offer

  • Wings Credit Union is offering a $300 bonus when you open a new checking account and complete the following requirements:
    • Use promo code WINGS25
    • Enroll in digital banking & eStatements
    • Establish recurring qualified payroll direct deposit(s) totaling $3,000 or more
    • Complete 15 5 or more net PIN or signature-based debit card or credit card purchases of $25 or more each

The Fine Print

  • One offer per person. Must be 18 years or older.
  • Membership with a Share Savings Account and $5 minimum opening deposit required; must be opened at the same time as checking account.
  • Membership must be opened between 7/1/25-8/31/25.
  •  Share Savings Account must be funded within 30 days of account opening.
  •  Online applicants must use promo code “Summer25” at account opening. Promo code is applied to checking account within online application.
  • New members and new recipients only: (a) Cannot have been a previous member (owner of a Primary Share account) of Wings Credit Union within 12 months of promotional account application. (b) Cannot have previously received a new account bonus.
  • Account must be in good standing (positive balance for the last 30 days).
  • Not applicable to business accounts or accounts established for estates, benefits, trusts or in a fiduciary capacity.
  • Establish recurring qualified payroll direct deposit(s) totaling $3,000 or more to earn the $300 bonus. Note: Direct deposit must also be active on the bonus payout date. “Qualified direct deposit” is an Automated Clearing House (“ACH”) automatic and electronic deposit of your salary, pension, Social Security or other regular income into your Wings account, deposited as a Pre-arranged Payment and Deposit (“PPD”) entry. Income earned through self-employment or working an IRS-classified “Gig Economy” job does not qualify as a qualified direct deposit. Other electronic deposits or person-to-person payments are not considered a qualified direct deposit.
  •  Enroll in Wings digital banking.
  • Enroll in eDocuments. Note: Enrollment in eDocuments must also be active on the bonus payout date.
  • Complete 15 5 or more net PIN or signature-based debit card or credit card purchases of $25 or more each. Note: Electronic transfers such as person-to-person payments via digital payment platforms or mobile payment apps are not considered as qualified debit card or credit card purchases.
  • All bank account bonuses are treated as income/interest and as such you have to pay taxes on them

Avoiding Fees

Monthly Fees

First class checking account has no monthly fees to worry about.

Early Account Termination Fee

I wasn’t able to find an early account termination in the fee schedule

Referral Bonus

There is also a $50 referral bonus for both parties. Last time Wings Financial offered a bonus the referral bonus and the main bonus stacked. Do not share your referrals in the comments below, you can share them in this linked posted instead. Some discussion on linking the promotions here.

Our Verdict

Not as good as the previous $400 bonus. Upside is that it’s now available nationwide again, because of that we will add this to our list of the best bank account bonuses. 

Hat tip to ShawntheShawn

  • A Beginners Guide To Bank Account Bonuses
  • Bank Account Quick Reference Table (Spreadsheet) (very useful for sorting bonuses by different parameters)

  • Banks That Allow/Don’t Allow Out Of State Checking Applications
  • Bank Bonus Posting Times

item.title: Rakuten: Get 10%/10x Back on Stubhub
item.content:encoded:
Rakuten今日(11/18/25)提供Stubhub的10%/10x返利活动。很多人利用此机会使用Chase Sapphire Reserve的$150年费后半额度。即使不用Stubhub，购买其他商品也能赚取10%利润+信用卡积分，Rakuten将持续发布10x或更高返利活动。

The Offer

Direct Link to Rakuten | Check all portal rates

  • Rakuten is offering 10%/10x back on Stubhub today, 11/18/25. Unclear how long it will last.

Our Verdict

A lot of people want this to use up their $150 Chase Sapphire Reserve credit for the second half of the year. Rakuten occasionally goes up to 10x. We’ll try to repost this whenever Rakuten or another portal gets to 10x or higher. 

If you literally have no use for Stubhub, you might want to buy something at portal promo like this one to net the 10% profit + points on the credit card. It’s not much, but maybe worth the hassle.

If you’re new to Rakuten, it’s a good time to sign up now with the $50/5,000 points signup bonus.

item.title: U.S. Bank Double Cashback On Cashback Credit Card Deals (11/26-11/28)
item.content:encoded:
信用卡返现促销活动将于11月26-28日回归，提供双倍返现及10%折扣，使用BONUSDAYS优惠码并通过U.S. Bank卡支付可获额外优惠(限单订单)。活动此前在3月27-30日举行，与15%超市购物(最高25美元返现)或10% IKEA购物(最高20美元返现)等搭配使用效果更佳。注意商务卡持卡人无法在应用或网上银行找到此优惠。

Update 11/17/25: Press release here. Double on cashback deals. This now also includes double discount on gift card purchases at The Gift Card Shop which is 10% back (use promo code BONUSDAYS and pay with U.S. Bank card; limit one order per customer). Valid 11/26 – 11/28.

Update 11/2/25: Deal is coming back for November 26 – November 28, 2025

Original Post:

Reader Bacon reports on a deal to get double cash back on offers within their credit card portal from March 27 – March 30th.

They also highlight that the deal can be substantial when paired with offers such as 15% cash back on Grocery (up to $25 cashback max) or 10% back at IKEA (up to $20 cashback max).

Note: business card holders won’t find the offer in the app or in online banking, but you can still access the Shopping Deals portal via email link and get the offer that way. 

Post History:

  • Update 5/14/25: Deal is back from June 11-13
  • Update 10/27/24: Deal is coming back from November 27th through 29th. Hat tip to reader BACON
  • Update 5/16/24: Deal is coming back for June 12 – 14. (ht reader pickle rick)

item.title: AmEx Offers: Get 10% Back on Expedia Hotel Bookings
item.content:encoded:
American Express酒店预订优惠：通过expedia.com/amex链接预订预付酒店("pay now")选项可获得10-15%返现作为账单贷记，普通用户最高$100，部分用户可达$150。优惠截止2024年12月19日，仅适用于美元支付的在线预付酒店预订，不包括"酒店付款"方式、游轮、度假套餐等。建议通过购物 portal 也能获得相同优惠。

Update 11/17/25: Deal is back and valid through 12/19/25. Limit $125 in total statement credits this time.

Update 1/7/25: Deal is back and valid until 4/7/2025.

The Offer

Check your AmEx Offers for the following deal:

  • Earn 10% back as a statement credit after using your enrolled eligible Card to make purchases of prepaid hotel bookings (“pay now”) online at expedia.com/amex by 12/19/2024. Limit of $100 back in total statement credits.
  • Others got 15%, up to $150 in statement credits.

The Fine Print

  • Offer valid for pre-paid hotel purchases made online through the following link expedia.com/amex using the pre-paid option at checkout (“pay now”) only.
  • Excludes “pay at property” purchases and purchases made over the phone.
  • Excludes all other purchases not made at expedia.com/amex link using the pre-paid option at checkout.
  • Excludes cruises, vacation packages, flights, car rental and activities, trip insurance and other 3rd party brands. American Express identifies qualifying transactions based on information provided by the participating merchant.
  • Offer valid only on purchases made in US dollars.
  • Offer only valid on purchases made directly with the merchant. Offer not valid on purchases made using third parties, such as resellers, delivery services, or other intermediaries.

Our Verdict

Nice savings for prepaid hotels bookings. Typically going through a shopping portal would work as well; while the terms say to go through the AmEx link, this historically has not been enforced with other similar offers.

View more Amex offers here & if you have any questions about American Express offers then read this post.

item.title: AmEx Offers: BJ’s Wholesale, Spend $300 & Get $60 Back
item.content:encoded:
AmEx Offer提供在BJ's Wholesale Club消费满300美元返60美元statement credit的优惠。活动截止2025年12月31日，适用于线下门店及bjs.com线上消费。 excludes会员费、B2B交易、汽油、光学产品等特定类别，美国境内有效。适合经常在该超市购物的人群，可通过购买Visa gift卡等方式达到消费门槛。

The Offer

Check your AmEx Offers for the following deal: 

  • Earn a one-time $60 statement credit after using your enrolled eligible Card to spend a minimum of $300 in one or more purchases in-store at BJ’s Wholesale Club or online at bjs.com by 12/31/2025. See terms.

The Fine Print

  • Offer valid in-club at US locations, online only at US website bjs.com or through the BJ’s Wholesale Club mobile app.
  • Excludes BJ’s memberships, B2B transactions, gas and fuel, optical, travel, pharmacy, mortgages, home project center, home services, and Ready Refresh.
  • Not valid on purchases shipped outside of the US. 

Our Verdict

Good deal for BJ’s Wholesale. It should even be possible to buy a Visa gift card in-club or online.

item.title: Get $150 From Rakuten/TCB With Kraken Crypto Signup (Stack With Up To $150 via Referral)
item.content:encoded:
文章介绍了Kraken加密货币交易平台的多重奖励方案：通过Rakuten购物门户可获$150/15,000点奖励，Kraken推荐计划提供$75+$75奖励。需在30天内完成指定加密货币交易（如$260买入立即$255卖出可满足要求）。提醒读者加密交易有风险，可能亏损，且推荐奖金不适用于美国部分州。建议新手选择简单交易方式，并提到可利用"Spin to win"获得额外$20-$30奖励。

Update 11/17/25: Topcashback is at $152.51 now, so that’s another option. Rakuten is also still at $150/15,000. Some people have complained about Topcashback tracking so maybe it makes more sense to do the Rakuten. (Personally I used Topcashback a while back. It tracked and paid out fine for me, and it stacked with the referral as well.)

You can find a referral in this post – comments there are closed to new commenting. Do not leave a referral in the comments below and no referral fishing.

Update 11/15/25: Rakuten now $150 again. 

The Offer

Note: Kraken is a crypto app and is not FDIC/SPIC insured. Do what you’re comfortable with. 

  • Rakuten is offering $150 (or 15,000 points) when you signup for Kraken and trade $200.
  • Topcashback is offering $100 when you signup for Kraken and trade $100. 
  • We’re hearing multiple reports out there that the $220 offer from Capital One is around again (you’ll have to poke around a lot to get this and possibly still won’t get it). Update: the $220 is very widespread, just poke around in Capital One and do some click, etc. 

Separately, there is a referral bonus of up to $150 for referrer and $150 for the new member when the new members signs up and trades crypto, like Bitcoin (stablecoin does not work for the referral bonus). You can signup on the web or in the mobile app, but do the crypto trading in the Kraken app. Don’t forget to input the code during the signup process. Bonus details:

  • Trade $100 and get $15
  • Trade $300 and get $20 ($35 total)
  • Trade $500 and get $40 ($75 total)
  • Trade $5,000 and get $75 ($150 total)

Reports indicate that you can do one ~$260 buy and then immediate sell ~$255 to get the entire $75 payout in one shot ($15+$20+$40). The buy and sell count separately, and so if you buy $260 and then sell $255 (you typically lose a few dollars in the process) it will be more than the required $500.

Someone who wants to do $5,000 in trades, can transfer over a smaller amount (e.g. $400 or $500) and then continue to buy/sell the same money until they meet the $5,000 threshold. Keep in mind there will be some loss with each sale, so you might not gain much with the $5,000 deal over the $500 deal unless you know what you are doing. 

Opt in to Kraken+ free trial for 30 days to save the 1% trade fees; just remember to cancel.

There are some other varieties of referral links. All referral links should work for the $75 bonus if you buy/sell $500 (e.g. $260 buy and then $255 sell). Most links also have the added $75 bonus when you buy/sell $5,000.

The Fine Print

  • You need to trade actual crypto to be eligible for the referral bonus whereas for the portal bonus you can trade stablecoin, far as I can tell. 
  • Both the referral and the portal bonuses require the trade be done in the first 30 days. 
  • The Kraken Referral Program is available only in the United States (excluding Maine, Washington and New York), Canada, Netherlands, France, Spain, Poland, Italy, Belgium, and Ireland.
  • (Editor’s note: A reader points out that presumably the shopping portal component should work even in the excluded states; just the referral bonus won’t work.)

Our Verdict

If you click through Rakuten, apply a referral code during signup, and then trade $500 in crypto within 30 days, you’ll end up with 15,000/$150 from Rakuten and you’ll get $75 referral bonus from Kraken. You can trade an additional $4,500 in crypto to get the additional $75 bonus, if you choose.

Myself and others were able to get the portal to stack with a referral code by clicking through the portal and then entering a referral code. Within minutes you should get the email from Kraken about the referral bonus. I did the Bitcoin trade and then immediately sold the Bitcoin since I didn’t want money tied up in crypto and subject to those long risky fluctuations.

Note: even if you do Kraken+ for free trading, you can still lose some money as the crypto cost fluctuates in the few minutes between buy/sell. I bought Bitcoin and sold it a couple of minutes later and somehow lost $6 in the process. This was with a small purchase of Bitcoin that I bought. Some people report even more losses, especially when trading larger amounts.

For that reason, many people will prefer the $75 referral bonus for an easy $150+$75 for a small $500 crypto buy. Do what you’re comfortable with. Ideas for those who want to do the $5,000/$150 tier:

  • Reportedly you can use the same funds to meet a tier. For example, you can transfer in $260 and then trade that twice to meet the $500 tier. Or you can transfer in $5000-$600 and trade it ten times (buy/sell) and meet the $5,000 tier.
  • You can set a Limit price to your buys and sells which can help reduce the losses in each sale. Again, those who are not adept at these methods might prefer to just do a simple $500 buy/sell (and probably lose a few dollars along the way) in order to get the portal bonus + $75 referral bonus, and ignore the second tier.

After signing up with Kraken, you can also ‘Spin to win’ once per day for the first 30 days, and you should end up with another $20-$30 from that. So that’s a little added bonus on top.

If you are new to Rakuten shoppping portal, now is a good time to signup for the $50/5,000 signup bonus. (There’s even a chance that doing this Kraken offer will be enough to meet the spend requirement for that signup bonus.)

You can find referral codes and links in this dedicated thread. Do not under any circumstance put your referral in the comments below.

item.title: Amazon: Apple Watch Series 11 For $349/$379
item.content:encoded:
Amazon 特价销售 2025 年 9 月新发布的 Apple Watch Series 11，42mm 型号售价 $349.99，46mm 型号售价 $379.99，均为原价的折扣价。目前仅 Amazon 有此低价，节日期间其他零售商可能会有类似优惠。

The Offer

Amazon link to 42mm | Amazon link to 46mm – choose your color (these contain our affiliate, thanks for your support)

  • Amazon is selling the 42mm Apple Watch Series 11 for $349.99. Compare on Apple for $399.
  • Amazon is selling the 46mm Apple Watch Series 11 for $379.99. Compare on Apple for $429.

Our Verdict

This is the model recently released in September 2025. Right now only Amazon has this low price, though I wouldn’t be surprised to see it on other retailers like Walmart and Best Buy at some point over the holidays. Stack with Shop With Points deals on Amazon for further discount.

item.title: (Update) ShopBack Shopping Portal $15+ In Signup Bonuses & More; Earn Cashback On Amazon & More
item.content:encoded:
ShopBack是提供现金返还的购物平台和浏览器扩展。新用户通过邀请码9f41g1注册可获$15奖励，另有$5扩展奖励和$6运费补贴。当前优惠包括Amazon购物返现、Walmart 20%返现、Doordash 10%返现等。用户可通过Quests任务获取额外奖励，如购物三品牌得$10。提现门槛为$5，通过PayPal进行。文章还列举了各种限时优惠，如ShipStation订阅返$45和Private Internet Access VPN 120%返现，以及历史优惠更新记录。

Update 11/17/25:

  • $45 back with paid ShipStation subscription. Shopback and Topcashback are both offering this. It seems to be a $30 moneymaker with a $15 subscription, but totally possible that I’m missing some details here.
  • 120% back on Private Internet Access VPN (should be a $11 moneymaker; add-ons probably won’t track; there is a 30-day moneyback guarantee which is useful in case of a portal tracking issue)

ShopBack Highlights

Direct Link to ShopBack (this link contains my referral code)

ShopBack is a cashback portal and extension – click through the portal or the extension and earn cashback on purchases at hundreds of retailers.

Here a few interesting offers that I see right now; these offers will change over time. You should be able to see many of the current boosted deals at this link.

  • Amazon (portal link)- ShopBack is offering $1 back for each and every purchase you make on Amazon 1.5% cashback on Amazon purchases, up to $5 per order and up to 5 purchases each month. Maximize by only clicking Shopback on your large Amazon purchases. Note: The terms exclude purchases paid with your Amazon gift card balance. For the Amazon cashback you need to click through the extension, whereas for other retailers you can click through the online portal without the extension. ShopBack does insert their affiliate cookie on the Amazon purchase which will supersede any other affiliate you clicked from.
  • Walmart (portal link) – currently they are offering 20% back on Walmart purchases in select categories. Max $15 cashback.
  • Doordash (portal link) – 10% back, up to $10 back on an order.
  • Uber EATS – earn $4 on each order (not limited to first order like on other portals).

Referral Bonus $15 & More

ShopBack has a nice signup bonus of $15 for new members who sign up using a referral link. The $15 will reflect immediately in your ShopBack. Within 180 days, the new member has to earn $5 $10 in Confirmed Cashback. The $15 referral bonus will then become available if you’ve confirmed your Paypal withdrawal details.

There’s also a $15 bonus for the referrer. After signing up, you’ll be able to find your referral link on this page.

If you ever wanted to buy me a drink, here is my ShopBack referral link. Thanks. 🙂 (You’ll see the referral bonus reflected when clicking through the link. You can also go directly to Shopback.com and enter referral code 9f41g1 during signup and you’ll see the $15 signup bonus reflected on the page.)

$5 Extension Bonus

They also typically have a special offer for new members to get $5 for adding the Shopback browser extension and using it once. These offers vary, but keep a lookup on your Quests.

$6 Shipping Bonus

New users typically also have an offer to get $5.98 in bonuses via two $2.99 shipping rebates if you shop through the Shopback browser extension. You have to apply the rebate at checkout and then the cashback shows up in your account afterward. Some report getting those shipping rebates even when there was no shipping cost. YMMV. New users should see this shipping rebate offer on their Quests page. It only works at select retailers (including Walmart, Best Buy, eBay, Petco, Temu, DoorDash, Newegg and more), and only when using the extension. Easyish $5.98 in bonuses.

Quests Bonus

You can also get various other bonuses on Shopback by going to the Quests tab at the top of the page, or use this link. Be sure to ‘Join’ the Quests and then afterward ‘claim’ the bonus. You might be doing some of these activities anyway and these are easy additional bonuses.

Here are some of the Quests bonuses, these bonuses will change over time; I’ll leave these here just as examples:

  • $10 bonus for shopping any 3 brands
  • $20 on first purchase with a minimum spend of $10 or more
  • $20 for spending $250 on travel brands
  • For Ulta and Bed Bath & Beyond: shop $100 and get $10 (that’s on top of the regular portal rates)

Note: Quests are sometimes shown only to selected users, and they also have a quota which runs out; it can run out until you ‘Claim’ it so do that as soon as you can. Click on each Quests offer separately to find additional details and terms of the offer.

Cashout

ShopBack offers Paypal to cashout. $5 minimum required to cashout.

Update History

  • Update 11/11/25: 22% Ulta, 11% Walmart, Kohl’s, Macy’s; 44% Temu, 22% Shein. From 11:11am PST until 2:11pm PST (2:11pm ET until 5:11pm ET) get 11% back on Instacart, DoorDash, UberEATS.  New Shopback users get 10% back on Amazon, up to $5 back. 
  • Update 11/6/25: 10% back on eBay ($10 cap per item), 10% Best Buy ($25 cap per order) and Home Depot; 15% Sam’s Club ($20 cap per order), Chewy, Old Navy, Gap; 20% Nike; 8% Stubhub. Valid 11/6/25 – 11/8/25.
  • Update 10/30/25: Instacart, Groupon, Walmart at 10%, valid 10/30-10/31.
  • Update 10/28/25: 15% back on Instacart, up to $15 per order. Valid 10/28 and 10/29. 
  • Update 10/27/25: 5% back on Instacart, today only, up to $10 per order
  • Update 10/15/25: signup bonus was decreased back to $15 now. 
  • Update 10/8/25: Sign up bonus has increased from $15 to $30. Direct Link to ShopBack (this link contains my referral code)
  • Update 10/7/25: 15% cash back on Amazon until 10/9, first 10k users. Capped at $10 back
  • (10/1-10/6) Amazon 5% cashback (capped at $5 per order); limited to the first 10,000 ShopBack users). I’m not seeing the limit of 5 per month for this increased cashback rate, YMMV.
  • (10/5) Uber Eats: 10% Cashback (capped at $5) — 5PM–7PM PT
  • (10/5-10/6) Sam’s Club 10%
  • Stubhub 8% cashback
  • (10/1-10/6) A few interesting Quests offers, be sure to Join and afterwards to Claim.
  • (Upcoming 10/6) Hotels.com: 10% Cashback (capped at $10); Giftcards.com up to 10% cashback (capped at $12)
  • (Upcoming 10/7 5pm-6pm PT) 50% cashback on Amazon. Image below. (I’m guessing it will be with a max $5 cashback, and possibly limited to just one $5 reward. This promo coincides with Amazon Prime Big Deal Days 10/7-10/8 2025.)
  • (Upcoming 10/7-10/8) $1 Deals for things like socks, slippers, etc. See image below.
  • (10/1–10/3) Groupon: 10% Cashback (capped at $10); Albertsons: 10% Cashback (capped at $10); TikTok Shop: 15% Cashback (capped at $10); Walmart 10% cashback (capped at $10) on eligible categories. Also Stubhub is currently 8% back at time of this writing. 
  • (Upcoming 10/4–10/6) Sam’s Club: 10% Cashback (capped at $10); Macy’s: 15% Cashback (capped at $15)
  • (Upcoming 10/4) DoorDash: 10% Cashback (capped at $5) — 5PM–7PM PT
  • (9/30 only) Booking.com 20% on Accommodations, Agoda.com 12% on Hotels; Walmart 10% back on eligible categories
  • (9/17-9/30) A few interesting Quests bonuses for Tech, Travel, eBay, Giftcards.com. Remember to Join first and to Claim afterwards.
  • (9/27–9/28) Walmart & Sam’s Club: 10% back; Home Depot: 5–15% back
  • (9/23-9/25) Hotels.com 10% back on hotels and car rentals, up to $50 cashback per booking
  • (9/22-9/23) Apple 10% back, up to $20 cashback (I’m only finding this one showing in the Shopback app)
  • (9/22) 120% back on Private Internet Access VPN (should be a $11 moneymaker and a nice service to try; add-ons probably won’t track; there is a 30-day moneyback guarantee which is useful in case of a portal tracking issue)

Older update history can be found at this link.

Our Verdict

This looks to be an easy $15 with the initial signup referral bonus if you can get $5 in cashback earnings (e.g. five Amazon purchases or any other merchant). And hopefully you’ll get a few Quests bonuses or other increased offers which can spruce up your earnings further.

Other than the initial signup bonuses, the portal can be useful for the cashback earn on Amazon and for some of the other boosted cashback offers as well. Always compare rates against other shopping portals on Cashbackmonitor or another aggregator.

ShopBack has a Wikipedia page and has apparently been around since at least 2015. They seem to be an established company in other countries and are now expanding into the U.S. (We have no direct relationship with ShopBack.)

The Shopback platform has a sleek and professional feel. I also like that the terms are spelled out clearly for each retailer. Hopefully this will turn out to be another useful shopping portal/extension. Feel free to chime in below with your experiences.

item.title: AmEx Offers (Platinum/BG Cards): Walmart.com, Get $20-off-$60 (2x) or 25% Back
item.content:encoded:
美国运通(AmEx)为Platinum和Business Gold卡持卡人提供Walmart促销：在Walmart.com或移动App消费满60美元可获20美元账单贷记(最高40美元)，有效期至2025年12月31日；25%折扣(最高25返利)，有效期至2026年1月31日。优惠仅限在线购买，不包括Walmart+会员费、批量礼品卡、店内购买、第三方网站交易及美国境外运输的购买。仅限美元直接交易，不适用于第三方的Walmart.com关联网站。

The Offer

Check your AmEx Offers on the American Express consumer Platinum and Business Gold cards for one of the following deals:

  • Earn a $20 statement credit after using your enrolled eligible to spend a minimum of $60 in one or more purchases online at Walmart.com or the Walmart mobile app by 12/31/2025. Limit of 2 statement credits (total of $40). 
  • Get 25% off Walmart.com, valid through 1/31/26. Max $25 back. 

The Fine Print

  • Offer valid online only at US website Walmart.com or through the Walmart mobile app. Valid on Walmart pickup and delivery purchases made online at Walmart.com.
  • Excludes Walmart+ membership purchases.
  • Not valid on purchases shipped outside of the US. Excludes in-store purchases, bulk gift cards and e-gift cards, layaway purchases, insurance services, auto services, pharmacy, protection plans, home services, and recurring subscription services (for example, Beauty Box and Baby Box).
  • Excludes purchases made on third party and affiliate websites associated with walmart.com (such as, but not limited to, Walmart Contacts, Walmart Checks, Walmart Photo Services, Walmart Stationary, and Walmart Moneygram).
  • Offer valid only on purchases made in US dollars.
  • Offer only valid on purchases made directly with the merchant. 

Our Verdict

This is a special offer for the consumer Platinum card and the Business Gold card. It might be available to all those who have these cards. Obviously a great deal for Walmart.

Offers excludes bulk gift card purchases, and it should work fine on ordinary gift cards purchased on Walmart.com or the Walmart mobile app (whether Walmart’s own gift cards or a third party gift card) since these would process through the regular Walmart.com checkout system. Useful to then use the Walmart gift card to shop in store or at Sam’s Club or at their gas stations.

View more Amex offers here & if you have any questions about American Express offers then read this post.

item.title: Amazon Music Unlimited: Free 3-Month Subscription
item.content:encoded:
Amazon Music Unlimited现提供免费3个月试用，通过链接可领取。Prime会员月费10.99美元，非Prime会员11.99美元。优惠适用于未订阅用户，价值约24-30美元。提醒用户确认显示3个月免费后再注册，并在试用结束前取消以避免自动续费。此优惠多次回归，最近更新于2025年11月17日。

Update 11/17/25: Deal is back – check if you are eligible

The Offer

Direct Link to offer (our affiliate link here and below)

  • Amazon Music Unlimited is offering a free 3 month trial at the above link. Just be sure the trial offer is showing for you when signing up.

After the trial you’ll be charged the regular $10.99 (prime) or $11.99 (non-prime) rate each month if you don’t cancel.

It looks like this offer is showing for everyone, so long as you aren’t currently subscribed to Amazon Music. Nice freebie which is worth $24-$30. Just make sure you’re seeing the 3 free months before signing up, and also be sure to cancel (direct link) before the free trial is up if you don’t want to keep it.

Post History:

item.title: [Targeted] Chase Ink Business Preferred 100,000 Points Offer With $8,000 Spend Requirement
item.content:encoded:
Chase INK Business Preferred信用卡可能有特别优惠：开卡三个月内消费8000美元可获100,000 Ultimate Rewards奖励点数（标准为90,000点）。卡片年费95美元首不免除，无外汇交易费，含主要租车保险。此优惠显示于部分用户Chase应用中，建议申请前查看详情，如广泛可用将更新。

The Offer

No direct link, check your Chase app

Some people are seeing an increased offer from Chase on the INK Business Preferred card:

  • Signup for the Chase INK Business Preferred card and get 100,000 Ultimate Rewards bonus points after you spend $8,000 in the first three months after account opening.

Card Details

  • $95 annual fee (not waived the first year)
  • Chase 5/24 rule applies to this card
  • No foreign transaction fees
  • Primary rental car insurance
  • Read our full review

Our Verdict

There are reports of people seeing this in their Chase app, though I couldn’t personally find it. The standard offer is 90,000 and we once saw it go to 120,000 in 2024.

Check out these Things to Know about Chase Credit Cards before applying. If this becomes widely available, we’ll add it to our List of Best Credit Card Signup Bonuses.

Hat tip to Reddit user Famous-Emu-982

item.title: [YMMV] Papa John’s: Download App & Get $10 In Papa Dough
item.content:encoded:
Papa John's推出App下载优惠，新用户可获10美元Papa Dough奖励，有效期至11月20日。奖励需等待24小时到账，部分用户可能无法获得，YMMV（效果因人而异）。建议及时下载App以确认优惠是否有效。

Our Verdict

Rewards doesn’t appear instantly, need to wait 24 hours. Although apparently not appearing for some people so YMMV.

item.title: Staples: 100% Back In Points On Scotch Brand (Up To $40)
item.content:encoded:
Staples推出Scotch品牌100%返点优惠活动，消费者需主动激活该优惠才能享受。购买指定Scotch品牌产品可获全额积分返还，相当于实际折扣。此类限时促销通常适用于文具、办公用品等品类，建议有需求的消费者及时激活并把握购买时机，积分可用于后续抵扣消费。

The Offer

Direct link to offer

  • Staples is offering 100% back in points on scotch brand. Must activate offer. 

Our Verdict

Use a card that earns at a high rate on office supply stores. Stacks with manufacturer rebate as well.

item.title: Best Posts Last Week: 400k Credit Card Offer, $40 Shopping Portal & More
item.content:encoded:
这篇关于银行奖励和credit cards的博客文章提到更多客户成为奖励目标，部分offer要求direct deposit，有州特定bonus可查看，但需手动申领。许多优质deal已过期，建议读者及时查看或注册。文章分类包括credit cards、bank bonuses、deals等内容。

Capital One is offering 100,000 points on the X personal card and 400,000 points on the X business card. Chase is offering a 200,000 point bonus to some customers in branch on the Chase Sapphire Reserve. More people are targeted for the 300,000 point bonus on the Business Platinum. Some customers are being offered a 500,000 point bonus on the new First Bank Shop Your Way Rewards card. 

Wings Credit Union has a nationwide bank bonus for $300 + referral. 316 financial has a $100 nationwide bank bonus, but direct deposit is required this time. More state specific bonuses can be viewed below. 

Audible is offering three months for $0.99 + you get a $20 credit. BeFrugal is offering a $40 sign up bonus. Bilt has a targeted offer for $250 back when you spend $250+ on travel. YouTube TV customers can get a $20 credit, but you need to manually claim it. 

As always a lot of the good deals have already expired, make sure to either follow us on Twitter or get daily e-mail updates so you don’t miss any deals. If we missed any deals or you have an idea for a post, please let us know (will@doctorofcredit.com or chuck@doctorofcredit.com).
